thread.title: Why Israeli Police Are Investigating Benjamin Netanyahu

author: Rory Jones
title: Why Israeli Police Are Investigating Benjamin Netanyahu
text:
Israeli police have launched five investigations into Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his associates that together risk upending the leader’s long political career. He has labeled the probes a witch-hunt to force him from power. Here’s a rundown of the investigations.
Case 1000
Israeli police in February recommended charges of bribery, fraud and breach of trust against Mr. Netanyahu in Case 1000. They accuse Mr. Netanyahu of receiving cigars, Champagne and other gifts worth more than $280,000 from Hollywood... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
